summary: Use this API to query the status of the specified global product
description: Use this API to query the status of the specified global product. It takes several minutes for the global product to be created on each site. (CrossBoarderSellersOnly)

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/product/global/status/get','GET')
request.add_api_parameter("params", "{\"sellerSku\" : \"123\"}")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/product/global/status/get','GET')
request.add_api_param('params', '{\"sellerSku\" : \"123\"}')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

error_codes.description: This SKU can not be found under your shop account.
The requested seller sku does not exist in the current store, please check the correctness of the seller sku.
Endpoint exception, please use MY endpoint for GSP related requests.
The requested seller sku does not exist in the current store, please check the correctness of the seller sku.
